item.description:
This will be our first official ride of the season!  Meet at DD at the Rotary on Rt 28.  This willl be a "Main Streets and Back Roads of the South East" ride.  We'll stop for lunch and do a little "powderpuff maintenance seminar", too.

Be sure to check your bike soon to make sure she's ready to roll!

A nice easy day of riding to start the year off, and blow off the dust and cobwebs. There is a gas station right across the street from DD, should you need one.  The ride itself is only @ 55 - 60 miles long with stops along the way.
item.name: Mystery Ride!
